warning: `legacy_closed_enum` is deprecated
  --> testdata/editions/inheritance.proto:22:8
   |
22 | option features.(pb.cpp).legacy_closed_enum = false;
   |        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   = help: it has been deprecated since Edition 2023
   = help: reason: The legacy closed enum behavior in C++ is deprecated and is
           scheduled to be removed in edition 2025. See
           http://protobuf.dev/programming-guides/enum/#cpp for more information

encountered 1 warning
